name: Commercial Lease Agreement (Ghana)
description: Commercial lease for office or retail space in Ghana, referencing Act 1036 and common rent advance practices.

clauses.clause_text: THIS COMMERCIAL LEASE is made between {{landlord_name}} ('the Landlord') and {{tenant_name}} ('the Tenant') on {{lease_date}}.
The Landlord leases to the Tenant the following commercial space: {{premises_address}}, including the fixtures and fittings listed in Appendix B.
The term of this lease is {{lease_years}} years, commencing on {{commencement_date}} and ending on {{termination_date}}.

The rent is {{monthly_rent}} (GHS) per month. The Tenant shall pay an advance rent of {{advance_amount}} representing {{advance_months}} months of rent. Following the advance period, rent shall be paid {{payment_frequency}} (e.g. quarterly) in advance.
In addition to rent, the Tenant shall pay a monthly service charge of {{service_charge}} for security, cleaning of common areas, and {{other_services}}.
The premises shall be used solely for the purpose of {{business_activity}} and for no other purpose without the prior written consent of the Landlord.
The parties acknowledge the provisions of the Rent Act, 1963 (Act 220) and the Land Act, 2020 (Act 1036) regarding rent reviews and recovery of possession.
